entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Shell page Unloaded event fires when returning to it from another tab #15833
  • [8.0.0-preview.5.8529] [Android] DeviceSensors produce an ANR at irregular intervals when built in Release mode. #15829
  • Button.LineBreakMode does not work on Windows #15828
  • Changing FlyoutItem Title causes Title to disappear #15827
  • [Android] [.Net 8] ListView doesn't get rendered #15826
    .NET 8
  • iOS: CollectionView - Horizontal CollectionView does not show the last element under some conditions #15815
  • CollectionView with non integer height request has atrocious scroll performance #15814
  • Shell.BackButtonBehavior doesn't react to swipe back #15813
    Backlog
  • Strange file picker behavior when using BlazorWebView #15812
  • TapGestureRecognizer Tapped events not worked in Windows Platform #15810
    .NET 8
  • CollectionView pushes content below it off the screen on macOS and iOS #15809
  • CollectionView not showing correctly inside AbsoluteLayout in iOS #15808
  • RadioButton Border color not working for focused visual state #15806
    Backlog
  • DatePicker Focused color not applied after date selection #15805
  • Picker selected item text color changes on mouse hover #15804
  • Maui Connectivity Change from Online to Offline to Online Connectivity.NetworkAccess == Unknown on Windows 10 #15803
  • Windows FontRegistrar assumes MSIX packaging #15802

Closed

  • Compiling a simple, basic, barebones Maui Xaml file (App.xaml.cs located in Platform -> Windows folder) that uses a minimal custom IMarkupExtension Fails to Compile, giving the Error, XamlCompiler error WMC0015: Cannot assign 'StringResourceXamlMarkupExtension' into property 'Text', type must be assignable to 'String' #15775
  • Corrupt aapt_rules.txt when Creating a Package per Abi on Android #15800
  • OnPlatform x:TypeArguments does not support Default case #15715
  • Android Button (maybe other controls) problem #13483
    Backlog
  • OnPlatform Xaml Syntax does not support AppThemeBinding #15716
  • DisplayPromptAsync: introduce a parameter for hiding the entered text (e.g. password) #15817
  • OnNightModeChanged Android not functional #7877
    Backlog
  • Missing Buttons-Property in TapGestureRecognizer-Control #12815
    Backlog
  • [Android] Issues with swiping at the bottom of a ScrollView w/ TalkBack #14186
    Backlog
  • [Android] Inconsistent first TalkBack focus on navigating to new page #14187
    Backlog
  • OnNavigatedTo and OnAppearing not being called #14284
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI targeting Windows does not show/display #14309
  • CollectionView and ScrollView on iOS don't decelerate with fling gesture. #15580
    Backlog
  • CollectionView scrollts content behind TitleBar (can't scroll down enough) on some devices #14149
  • Windows HorizontalList CollectionView has some weird space if cells are smaller than 88 dp #15241
    .NET 8

PullRequests

Created

  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Add logic to set DefaultLabelPosition on the WinUI CommandBar #15835
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue setting ContentPage gradient background #15832
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells #15831
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • [uitests] Fix uitests pipelines triggers for Compatibility tests #15830
    area/testing
  • Bump GtkSharp from 3.24.24.34 to 3.24.24.95 #15818
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 7.0.7 to 7.0.8 #15823
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix Button issue updating background brush type #15725
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [GraphicsTester] only build for maccatalyst-x64 #15798
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15801
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • [CI] Remove nested templates in the running steps. #15797
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Streamline ModalNavigation lifecycle events #15799
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #15777
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
